TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PrintSystemDesiredAccess extends System.Enum

summary.span: Specifies the different access rights (or levels of access) for printing objects.

span.span: Specifies the different access rights (or levels of access) for printing objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Los derechos de acceso que están disponibles en cada nivel de acceso varían según lo siguiente:The access rights that are available at each level of access vary according to the following: - Si el servidor de impresión es un equipo o un dispositivo de servidor de impresión.Whether the print server is a computer or a print server appliance. - El sistema operativo que se utiliza.The operating system that is used. - Las actualizaciones de seguridad que están instaladas.The security updates that are installed. - Las directivas de seguridad que son compatibles.The security policies that are supported. Por esta razón, las descripciones de derechos de acceso en la sección "Miembros" son típicas de los derechos que corresponden a cada nivel de acceso, pero los niveles de acceso mostrados pueden proporcionar más o menos derechos en sistemas operativos concretos.For this reason, access right descriptions in the "Members" section are typical of the rights that will correspond to each access level, but the access levels listed may provide more or fewer rights on particular systems. Estos valores se utilizan principalmente como parámetros para y constructores.These values are primarily used as parameters for and constructors. Los constructores producirán excepciones si utiliza un valor que se puede aplicar solo a otro tipo de objeto.The constructors will throw exceptions if you use a value that can apply only to another kind of object. Por ejemplo, no pase AdministratePrinter a un constructor.For example, do not pass AdministratePrinter to a constructor. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se muestra cómo utilizar esta enumeración para instalar a una segunda impresora que difiere en sus propiedades de una impresora existente solo en la ubicación, el puerto y el estado compartido.The following example shows how to use this enumeration to install a second printer that differs in its properties from an existing printer only in location, port, and shared status. [!code-csharp[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/CSharp/Program.cs#cloneprinter)] [!code-vb[ClonePrinter#ClonePrinter](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ClonePrinter/visualbasic/program.vb#cloneprinter)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess AdministratePrinter = int32(983052)

summary.span: The right to perform all administrative tasks for the print queue, including the right to pause and resume any print job; and the right to delete all jobs from the queue.

span.span: The right to perform all administrative tasks for the print queue, including the right to pause and resume any print job; and the right to delete all jobs from the queue.

summary.span: This access level also includes all rights under .

span.span: This access level also includes all rights under .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess AdministrateServer = int32(983041)

summary.span: The right to perform all administrative tasks for the print server.

span.span: The right to perform all administrative tasks for the print server.

summary.span: This access level does *not* include rights for the print queues hosted by the server.

span.span: This access level does *not* include rights for the print queues hosted by the server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess EnumerateServer = int32(131074)

summary.span: The right to list the queues on the print server.

span.span: The right to list the queues on the print server.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Printing.PrintSystemDesiredAccess UsePrinter = int32(131080)

summary.span: The right to add print jobs to the queue and to delete and enumerate one's own jobs.

span.span: The right to add print jobs to the queue and to delete and enumerate one's own jobs.
